Hi Lea, 
That would work well, thanks. Talk to you then. 
Sent from my iPhone 
> On Jul 8, 2020, at 11:24 AM, Lea Harmon <MIIMIN> wrote:

Hi 
Lea, 
> I hope you're doing well. Do you have a moment for a call today to discuss this case? If there is a time that 
works best for you, please let me know. You're also welcome to call me on my cell at any time: 
> Thanks very much, 
> 
Sent from my iPhone 
EFTA00030379
